content: Working at home = talking to myself. I tell myself I’m talking to my dogs all day, but it’s just a cover unless they can help solve the world’s problems. But by now I’m pretty sure they know English fluently due to the immersive element of my ceaseless convo, so maybe they can. I shouldn’t underestimate. (You said something about long and rambling too, right?) I think a new post should perhaps be told in sock puppet! Best panel ever 👍
